typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	SourceSystem as string ("CloudSales")
}
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as date,
		ShipDate as date,
		TotalCost as double,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CloudSalesOrders
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitCost as float,
		LineNumber as integer,
		CreatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd\' \'HH:mm:ss.SSS',
		UpdatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd\' \'HH:mm:ss.SSS'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	dateFormats: ['yyyy/MM/dd'],
	timestampFormats: ['yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss.SSS\'Z\''],
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	preferredFractionalType: 'float',
	booleanFormat: ['1', '0']) ~> CloudSalesOrderDetails
CloudSalesOrderDetails derive(CreatedDate = toDate(CreatedDate),
		UpdatedDate = toDate(UpdatedDate)) ~> DateTypes
CloudSalesOrders, DateTypes join(CloudSalesOrders@OrderID == CloudSalesOrderDetails@OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		OrderID = CloudSalesOrders@OrderID,
		OrderDetailID,
		CustomerID,
		OrderDate,
		ShipDate,
		TotalCost,
		CreatedDate = CloudSalesOrders@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = CloudSalesOrders@UpdatedDate,
		OrderID = CloudSalesOrderDetails@OrderID,
		MovieID,
		Quantity,
		UnitCost,
		LineNumber,
		CreatedDate = DateTypes@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = DateTypes@UpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(SourceSystem = 1) ~> AddSourceSystemId
AddSourceSystemId sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Sink
